problems.fix_prompt: Implement HSM integration for secure key storage, add hardware-backed cryptographic operations, create HSM failover mechanisms, and implement HSM monitoring.
Implement secure boot with verified boot chain, add firmware integrity validation, create boot attestation, and implement boot anomaly detection.
Implement TEE for sensitive operations, add enclave-based computation, create secure memory isolation, and implement attestation mechanisms.
Implement secure firmware update with digital signatures, add rollback protection, create update verification, and implement firmware integrity monitoring.
Implement physical tamper detection, add secure physical interfaces, create physical access logging, and implement hardware security monitoring.
Implement secure element integration, add hardware-based authentication, create secure key derivation, and implement secure element monitoring.
Implement hardware root of trust, add trust chain validation, create trust anchor management, and implement trust verification.
Implement secure debug authentication, add debug interface protection, create debug session monitoring, and implement debug access controls.
Implement secure communication protocols with perfect forward secrecy, add protocol security validation, create communication monitoring, and implement protocol upgrade mechanisms.
Implement secure key escrow with multi-party control, add escrow audit trails, create key recovery procedures, and implement escrow compliance monitoring.
Implement secure multi-party computation protocols, add privacy-preserving analytics, create secure aggregation, and implement MPC verification.
Implement secure federated learning with differential privacy, add model poisoning protection, create federated authentication, and implement federated monitoring.
Implement differential privacy mechanisms, add privacy budget management, create privacy-preserving queries, and implement privacy validation.
Implement secure aggregation protocols, add aggregation verification, create privacy-preserving statistics, and implement aggregation monitoring.
Implement zero-knowledge proof systems, add privacy-preserving authentication, create verifiable computation, and implement ZKP validation.
Implement attribute-based encryption schemes, add policy-based access control, create attribute management, and implement ABE monitoring.
Implement proxy re-encryption for secure data sharing, add delegation management, create re-encryption policies, and implement PRE monitoring.
Implement searchable encryption schemes, add encrypted query processing, create search privacy protection, and implement search monitoring.
Implement functional encryption for selective data access, add function-based policies, create functional key management, and implement FE monitoring.
Implement identity-based encryption schemes, add identity verification, create IBE key management, and implement IBE monitoring.
Implement broadcast encryption for secure group communication, add dynamic group management, create broadcast key distribution, and implement broadcast monitoring.
Implement ring signature schemes for anonymous authentication, add signature verification, create anonymity protection, and implement ring signature monitoring.
Implement group signature schemes, add group member management, create signature traceability, and implement group signature monitoring.
Implement blind signature schemes for anonymous credentials, add signature unlinking, create privacy protection, and implement blind signature monitoring.
Implement threshold cryptographic schemes, add secret sharing, create distributed key generation, and implement threshold monitoring.
Implement verifiable secret sharing schemes, add share verification, create secret reconstruction, and implement VSS monitoring.
Implement cryptographic commitment schemes, add commitment verification, create binding and hiding properties, and implement commitment monitoring.
Implement oblivious transfer protocols, add privacy-preserving data retrieval, create OT security validation, and implement OT monitoring.
Implement private set intersection protocols, add privacy-preserving set operations, create PSI verification, and implement PSI monitoring.
Implement secure comparison protocols, add privacy-preserving ordering, create comparison verification, and implement secure comparison monitoring.
Implement garbled circuit protocols, add secure function evaluation, create circuit optimization, and implement garbled circuit monitoring.
Implement homomorphic signature schemes, add computation authentication, create signature verification, and implement homomorphic signature monitoring.
Implement lattice-based cryptographic schemes, add quantum resistance, create lattice parameter selection, and implement lattice-based monitoring.
Implement code-based cryptographic schemes, add error correction, create code parameter selection, and implement code-based monitoring.
Implement multivariate cryptographic schemes, add polynomial system solving, create parameter selection, and implement multivariate monitoring.
Implement hash-based signature schemes, add Merkle tree construction, create signature verification, and implement hash-based monitoring.
Implement isogeny-based cryptographic schemes, add isogeny computation, create parameter validation, and implement isogeny-based monitoring.
Implement quantum key distribution protocols, add quantum channel security, create QKD verification, and implement quantum monitoring.
Implement quantum random number generators, add entropy validation, create randomness testing, and implement quantum RNG monitoring.
Implement quantum digital signature schemes, add quantum verification, create signature security, and implement quantum signature monitoring.
Implement quantum secure direct communication, add quantum message transmission, create QSDC verification, and implement quantum communication monitoring.
Implement secure quantum teleportation protocols, add state verification, create teleportation security, and implement quantum teleportation monitoring.
Implement quantum error correction codes, add error syndrome detection, create error recovery, and implement quantum error monitoring.
Implement secure quantum machine learning, add quantum algorithm protection, create QML verification, and implement quantum ML monitoring.
Implement quantum-resistant blockchain protocols, add quantum-safe consensus, create quantum blockchain verification, and implement quantum blockchain monitoring.
Implement quantum internet security protocols, add quantum network authentication, create quantum routing security, and implement quantum internet monitoring.
Implement quantum cloud security controls, add quantum service authentication, create quantum cloud monitoring, and implement quantum access controls.
Implement quantum sensing security protocols, add sensor authentication, create measurement verification, and implement quantum sensing monitoring.
Implement quantum simulation security controls, add simulation verification, create quantum simulation monitoring, and implement simulation integrity protection.
Implement quantum supremacy validation protocols, add computational verification, create quantum advantage testing, and implement quantum supremacy monitoring.
